categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Trad was one of Satele Shan's students during the Third Galactic War. Shan and her students, including Trad, were all infected by Tenebrae's curse and held within a massive ship by Kira Carsen and Scourge. Most of them were released by the Commander of the Eternal Alliance who ended Tenebrae for good. However, Trad did not survive the ordeal and Trad's loss was mourned by Shan and the rest of her students.
Trad first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Onslaught as part of the "Echos of Oblivion" flashpoint, where the student's name was first revealed by Kira Carsen.
